document_data.title: Fang, Beak, and Claw
document_data.author: [[Sean K. Reynolds]]
document_data.realm year: [[1372 DR]]<ref group="note">No date is given in the adventure. The standard 3{{rd}}-edition setting date is assumed.
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Fang, Beak, and Claw''''' is an adventure module by [[Sean K. Reynolds]] for the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' campaign setting using the 3{{rd}}-edition ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]'' rules. It was published on the [[Wizards of the Coast]] website on September 26, 2001. Intended for four 8{{th}}-level characters including a [[ranger]], it has the PCs investigate killings by followers of [[Malar]] in an unspecified area of [[Faerûn]].
{{quote|''Fang, Beak, and Claw'' involves an evil [[druid]] of Malar, his cronies, and a tamed [[owlbear]]. Living in a sheltered grove altered by the druid's spells, they are using the beast to harass loggers in the woods and help in their cruel hunts. ''Fang, Beak, and Claw'' is a short Dungeons & Dragons adventure for four characters of about 8th level, one of whom should be a ranger or have some skill at tracking. Download this free mini-adventure today so that you can see how your group's PCs fare against this threat! Suitable for the Forgotten Realms campaign setting or other settings.|Website summary}}
